thread.title: 5 hot holiday deals this summer you don't want to miss out on, including Morocco, Algarve and more
thread.title_full: 5 hot holiday deals this summer you don't want to miss out on, including Morocco, Algarve and more - Mirror Online

author: by Mirror.co.uk
title: 5 hot holiday deals this summer you don't want to miss out on, including Morocco, Algarve and more
text:
Whether you are looking for an all inclusive package in the Costa del Sol , a family summer holiday in Tenerife , couples luxury break or a last-minute getaway to the historical treasure trove of Egypt , you can be sure to find some amazing value holiday deals with a little bit of digging online at lastminute.com .
Below we've done the digging for you and found five top deals for the perfect fun-filled getaway:
Top 5 holiday deals this summer Morocco from £189pp Top deal: Morocco from £189pp
Looking for a world of treasures to discover on your holiday? Book a trip to Morocco and immerse yourself in the colour and vibrancy of Marrakech.
Or relax and enjoy the stunning beaches and incandescent waters of Agadir. Treat yourself to something extra special and make the most out of this incredible country now.
See the latest deals here.
Algarve from £359pp Beach break: Algarve from £359pp
Sun worshippers will love the sun-drenched, golden Algarve coast. It's no wonder it is one of Europe’s most loved holiday destinations.
Head to Vilamoura to enjoy a luxurious beach break packed with golf, shopping and sumptuous restaurants, or opt for Portimao, a cosmopolitan resort in a stunning location, the ideal setting for a romantic getaway filled with great scenery and a relaxing atmosphere.
See the latest deals here.
Lanzarote from £399pp Family trip: Experience Lanzarote from £399pp
Nestled just off the African coast, Lanzarote combines striking volcanic landscapes with shimmering blue waters and year-round sunshine.
Families looking for the perfect summer holiday will love the variety of top beaches, vibrant markets and awe-inspiring volcanic caverns and national parks that are all just a click away with lastminute.com .
See the latest deals here.
Egypt from £489pp Culture and history: Go to Egypt from £489pp
Explore the ancient wonders of Luxor, Egypt , or enjoy the cosmopolitan nightlife and unusual daytime activities such as camel riding or 4x4 desert excursions in Hurghada.
For family fun Sharm El Sheikh offers fascinating national parks, golden beaches, glittering Red Sea waters and multi-coloured coral reef - perfect if you're an avid scuba diver.
See the latest deals here.
Majorca from £499pp Fun in the sun: Party it up in Magaluf from £499pp
Escape the dodgy British summer and sip sangria in Majorca instead with lastminute.com .
If you're an eternal raver, unleash your inner party animal amidst the vibrant nightlife of Magaluf, or relax and unwind on the beach in a secluded oasis like Camp de Mar if you prefer a gentler pace.
See the latest deals here.
*Prices are based on a 7 night stay at a 4* Hotel excluding Morocco which is a 3 night stay. Prices are subject to change and are subject to availability.
DailyMirror
